snippet.title: Captain Hookfoot Demo
snippet.description:
A playthrough of my final game for my Production 1 class, developed in six weeks. Captain Hookfoot is a point and click adventure game built from the ground up in Unity, and is inspired by games like Monkey Island and Pajama Sam.
You can find the game itself here: https://scyfer1.itch.io/captain-hookfoot
